response:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: for(Iterator<Map.Entry<String, JSONObject>> it = this_guy.iterator(); it.hasNext(); ){
    String key = it.next().getKey();
    if(key.equals("some_name_i_wont_know")){
        String value = it.next().getValue().getString("the value i care about");
        return value;
    }
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can use the iterator of the JSONObject to iterate through its entries and check if the key of the current entry is the one you're looking for. If it is, you can get the value of that entry.
